messages.subject: re: Neopets Advent Calendar
messages.msgSnippet: Wow!  Thanks Sandra...I had no idea about either of those freebies.  We got 2000 points and a food item for each pet, and for Christmas 489 points, an action
messages.messageBody:
Wow! Thanks Sandra...I had no idea about either of those freebies. We got 2000 points and a food item for each pet, and for Christmas 489 points, an action figure and a quilt :0)

Aimee (5) loves Neopets at the moment, but mostly she likes to watch me play it on herbehalf. Josh (8) loves a multitude of online games, and he seems very good at working out how to get the most points quickly- he may alreayd know about the freebies,- I can't wait to tell him when he wakes up! Thanks again.

Shell (in NZ)
DS8, DD5, DS 12 months

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
